help.short: The name of the Web Application Firewall Policy.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="rules">
<prop type="array" name="groupBy">
<prop type="array" name="matchConditions" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="matchValue" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="transforms">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="frontendEndpointLinks">
<prop type="array" name="managedRuleSets">
<prop type="array" name="exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="ruleGroupOverrides">
<prop type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_read>" name="exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="rules">
<prop type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_read>" name="exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="scrubbingRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="routingRuleLinks">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="securityPolicyLinks">

help.short: The name of the Web Application Firewall Policy.

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the Web Application Firewall Policy.
Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.
Resource location.
Resource tags.
Defines the Captcha cookie validity lifetime in minutes. This setting is only applicable to Premium_AzureFrontDoor. Value must be an integer between 5 and 1440 with the default value being 30.
If the action type is block, customer can override the response body. The body must be specified in base64 encoding.
If the action type is block, customer can override the response status code.
Describes if the policy is in enabled or disabled state. Defaults to Enabled if not specified.
Defines the JavaScript challenge cookie validity lifetime in minutes. Value must be an integer between 5 and 1440 with the default value being 30.
State of the log scrubbing config. Default value is Enabled.
Describes if it is in detection mode or prevention mode at policy level.
If action type is redirect, this field represents redirect URL for the client.
Describes if policy managed rules will inspect the request body content.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules" options="rules">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].groupBy" options="group-by">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions" options="match-conditions" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions[].matchValue" options="match-value" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions[].transforms" options="transforms">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets" options="managed-rule-sets">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].exclusions" options="exclusions">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides" options="rule-group-overrides">
<arg type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_create>" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].exclusions" options="exclusions">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules" options="rules">
<arg type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_create>" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules[].exclusions" options="exclusions">

help.short: Name of the pricing tier.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="rules" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules">
<prop type="array" name="groupBy" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].groupBy">
<prop type="array" name="matchConditions" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="matchValue" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions[].matchValue" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="transforms" arg="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions[].transforms">
<prop type="array" name="managedRuleSets" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets">
<prop type="array" name="exclusions" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="ruleGroupOverrides" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides">
<prop type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_create>" name="exclusions" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="rules" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules">
<prop type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_create>" name="exclusions" arg="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules[].exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="scrubbingRules" arg="$parameters.properties.policySettings.logScrubbing.scrubbingRules">

<prop type="array" name="rules">
<prop type="array" name="groupBy">
<prop type="array" name="matchConditions" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="matchValue" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="transforms">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="frontendEndpointLinks">
<prop type="array" name="managedRuleSets">
<prop type="array" name="exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="ruleGroupOverrides">
<prop type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_read>" name="exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="rules">
<prop type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_read>" name="exclusions">
<prop type="array" name="scrubbingRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="routingRuleLinks">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="securityPolicyLinks">

command.name: update

help.short: The name of the Web Application Firewall Policy.
Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.
Resource location.
Resource tags.
Defines the Captcha cookie validity lifetime in minutes. This setting is only applicable to Premium_AzureFrontDoor. Value must be an integer between 5 and 1440 with the default value being 30.
If the action type is block, customer can override the response body. The body must be specified in base64 encoding.
If the action type is block, customer can override the response status code.
Describes if the policy is in enabled or disabled state. Defaults to Enabled if not specified.
Defines the JavaScript challenge cookie validity lifetime in minutes. Value must be an integer between 5 and 1440 with the default value being 30.
State of the log scrubbing config. Default value is Enabled.
Describes if it is in detection mode or prevention mode at policy level.
If action type is redirect, this field represents redirect URL for the client.
Describes if policy managed rules will inspect the request body content.

command.argGroup:
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules" options="rules">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].groupBy" options="group-by">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions" options="match-conditions">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions[].matchValue" options="match-value">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.customRules.rules[].matchConditions[].transforms" options="transforms">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets" options="managed-rule-sets">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].exclusions" options="exclusions">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides" options="rule-group-overrides">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_update>" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].exclusions" options="exclusions">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules" options="rules">
<arg nullable="True" type="array<@ManagedRuleExclusion_update>" var="$parameters.properties.managedRules.managedRuleSets[].ruleGroupOverrides[].rules[].exclusions" options="exclusions">
